alert.note: Alert for Eastern Monmouth; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 5:33PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monmouth County through 600 PM EDT... At 533 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Long Branch, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Long Branch, Sandy Hook, Middletown, Tinton Falls, Red Bank, Keansburg, Highlands, Elberon, Navesink, Lincroft, Eatontown, West Long Branch, Rumson, Little Silver, Oceanport, Shrewsbury, Deal, Oakhurst and North Middletown. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 105 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
